title: Easy Factions
description: A Framework to develop relationships and reactions between characters and teams
longDescription:
Easy Factions makes it easier to split characters into teams/factions and generate unique interactions between them based on as many criteria as you wish. Developers can add as many teams as they wish and create AI Controllers that will contain specific logic and interactions with other teams.

The Team Component that's being attached to every Pawn can simplify the process of teaming up with the members of your faction. Every group can have its leader who is followed and protected by the rest of the members.

There is a built in Detection System that works just like in many popular AAA games (e.g. Watch Dogs, Splinter Cell, etc.).

The Police Dispatch Component will keep the area safe by controlling the behavior of Pawns controlled by the Police AI.

The whole framework was written to be built and expanded upon, so use it as a tool to demonstrate the behavior and type of your in-game gangs/teams/factions through gameplay!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Easy to create new teams and assign them to AI and Player Controllers
  •  Secured Areas system: allows you to "attach" members of a specific group to a territory and make them react to every Pawn overlaping the area
  •  Detection System: based on how far the target is, every Pawn will detect irritating Characters. For Players it is a filling bar in the middle of the screen.
  • Police Chasing System: Police are one of the default teams. A separate component helps every Police AI determine illegal actions and chase down Pawns that act accordingly
  • Easily team up with Pawns belonging to your faction (Team Component)

Code Modules:

  •  EasyFractions (Runtime)
